Body.Content:
The initial release of Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Teams on Apple visionOS will support both Enterprise and Consumer accounts.

How this will affect your organization

For Enterprise accounts, your organization may have device and application compliance requirements enforced via Microsoft Entra Conditional Access that will affect your ability to access Enterprise accounts on visionOS.

For Microsoft Intune device and application management operating system support, please refer to Operating systems and browsers supported by Microsoft Intune | Microsoft Learn. 

What you need to do to prepare

Before testing this support, please review your organization's requirements for conditional access, including device and application compliance, to determine if visionOS will be allowed for your organization.

Title: Microsoft Word, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft PowerPoint, and Microsoft Teams on Apple visionOS
